name: Innozilla Skins for Contact Form 7
author: Innozilla

sections.description:
Contact Form 7 Skins/Style – Makes creating Contact form 7 form styles easy – even if you don’t have HTML + CSS skills.

Important:

DEMO VERSION

FEATURES

  • Multiple form styling
  • Very Lightweight Plugin
  • Easy to use, Install and Style!
  • Layout settings (1-3 columns)
  • Field color, font size, border settings etc.
  • Button Style Settings.
  • Reset Style Functionality
  • Straight forward Settings
  • Responsive Ready
  • Minimal Design
  • Auto style upon installation
  • 100% CF7 compatible
  • Responsive Support.

PREMIUM FEATURES

  • ONE TIME PAYMENT
  • REALTIME form styling
  • STYLE ACTIVATOR
  • Updated styling settings
  • CF7 Compatible
  • Improved code standards
  • ONE TIME payment

You can get the PRO Version here!

Innozilla Skins for Contact Form 7 plugin is an addon for Contact Form 7 which needs to be installed on your WordPress website.

This plugin requires the Contact Form 7 plugin

For Plugin Customization you can contact Innozilla

OTHER PLUGINS WE DEVELOPED – WooCommerce Shipping Plugins

sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/innozilla-contact-form-7-skins.zip’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin.
  3. How to use? please check this video HOW TO USE THE PLUGIN
sections.faq:
What does Innozilla CF7 Skins do?

Innozilla CF7 Skins is an add-on plugin for Contact Form 7. It extends the functionality of Contact Form 7 by just tweaking the settings that can be found in the “Skin/Style – ICF7” tab.

Do I need to have coding skills to use Innozilla CF7 Skins?

Absolutely not. You can create and manage Contact Form 7 forms without any coding knowledge. (Very Simple form settings)

I still got questions. Where can I find the answers?

Please open a support ticket in the forum. We will get back to you within 24 hours.
